attributes.action: Premier League Title Winners, If the Season can’t be completed due to Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: It would be an injustice to the fans, and the teams, if the Football authorities declared the seasons void with no champions.
attributes.background:
The House of Commons should debate and pass the following motion.  

If the 2019/2020 English and Scottish Premier League seasons cannot be completed, due to the Covid 19 pandemic, the respective League Leaders should be declared 2019/2020 Champions and awarded the respective Trophies.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of the Football Association.
